snippet.title: 2D STEALTH METROIDVANIA - Siege and Sandfox Gameplay
snippet.description:
Join the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/siegefox

Follow the Sandfox as they navigate the environment and stealthily take out guards, in our latest video showcasing development of 'The Siege and the Sandfox'

Visit our website to see the gameplay reel take pride of place, and find more info and other ways to follow our updates.

https://www.siegeandsandfox.com

----------------

The Siege and the Sandfox is a 2D stealth Metroidvania for PC and Console, built in Unreal Engine 4 by Cardboard Sword, alongside partners Chucklefish.

Release date: TBA

For more info or to ask the dev team questions, go to any of the following:

Website: https://www.siegeandsandfox.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/siegefox
Twitter: https://twitter.com/siegeandsandfox
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/siegeandsandfox/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/siegeandsandfox
